txt.en: The grubs are still wriggling in the crate. How exciting!

'It's been a long day, hasn't it? I think you've earned a break!

Captain Róglarg smirks.

'I've had Lúksu cook something up for you in the Tower. Some Thrulbuz, some Zau, and even some Blúgzor! A nice, full meal to make the other Orcs jealous!

Go on, now! There's still more to be done once you're back!'
It's meat all right, wrapped in... innards?
Lúksu has set out three crates of repulsive food...
Lúksu can be found in the Tower of Cirith Ungol.\n\nYou have done your best to pretend that you ate and enjoyed Lúksu's food. You should now speak to Lúksu.
Crates of Blúgzor, Zau, and Thrulbuz can be found near Lúksu in the Tower of Cirith Ungol.\n\nYou have found Lúksu and must now \qsample\q his cooking.
After performing many of his tasks without question, Captain Róglarg has offered you a meal in Cirith Ungol.
'Hai! You must have been hungry, Silent One! You put all that down faster than any Orc I've ever known!\n\n'Must be easier without a tongue! Ha!'
Find Lúksu in the Tower of Cirith Ungol
Mmm! This stew is certainly... crunchy!

Lúksu can be found in the Tower of Cirith Ungol.\n\nCaptain Róglarg has offered you a break, and now expects you to eat an Orkish meal. You should find Lúksu and do your best to pretend that you have eaten his food.
